column4: argh been trying to connect my desktop and laptop wirelessly but no matter what i do they cant seem to be able to even ping each other
!dhcpd
is there a firewall?
both can ping the router?
there is no router
can they both ping another IP address?
they arent connected to any network, i just want them to see each other wirelessly
aah, ad hoc
any ideas?
sorry, I can't help you there
no exp with device to device (ad hoc) networks, sorry
alright, well now at least i know to say i am trying to do ad-hoc
I have not read this, but it might help:
thanks, reading a forum post right now, iwconfig doesnt seem to pay attention to me when i tell it what essid to use
does your network show up with 'iwlist scan' ?
good, is it working?
still havent touched the winbox yet =P
but iwlist scan doesnt bring up the essid that this box is using
i think i just got it too work!
sweet
they can ping!
good job
I would rather be embarrassed with a working solution than frustrated :d
